name: Daiquiri
instructions: Combine, shake, fine strain into coupe, no garnish

name: Corpse Reviver #2
instructions: rinse glass with a few drops absinthe, shake, fine strain, no garnish

name: Manhattan
instructions: combine, stir, strain into coupe with cherry and or lemon twist garnish

name: Pisco Sour
instructions: combine, dry shake, regular shake, fine strain into coupe, bitter design garnish

name: Vesper
instructions: combine, stir, strain into coupe, lemon twist garnish
